products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: GEOTECH > GROUND IMPROVEMENT > SAND GRAVEL MIX
products_entries.full_product_description: Supplying and filling sand gravel mix (1:1) with approved aggregate below road, RCC pavement, manholes, pits, foundations, bedding of UG piping etc. in layers of 150 mm loose thickness (maximum) including watering, ramming, rolling, compacting to achieve 85% relative density as per IS 2720 Part-XIV, quarrying, royalties, transportation, handling, etc. all complete as per drawings, specifications and directions of Engineer-in-Charge. (The rate shall be inclusive of the cost of all labour, material, equipment etc. all complete)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: mix ratio: 1:1, aggregate: approved, application: below road, RCC pavement, manholes, pits, foundations, bedding of UG piping, compaction: 85% relative density, standard: indian standard 2720 Part-XIV, feature: watering, ramming, rolling, compacting, quarrying, royalties, transportation, handling, as per drawings, specifications and directions of Engineer-in-Charge, inclusive of all labour, material, equipment

products_entries.full_product_description: Supplying and laying of Tensar Geogrid SS-40 or equivalent below roads, RCC pavements, manholes, in pipe trenches, culverts, foundations, hard stand etc. including overlap length, royalties, taxes, handling, transportation, unloading, storage, etc. all complete as per drawings, manufacturers specification and direction of Engineer-in-Charge.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: brand: Tensar or equivalent, model: SS-40, application: below roads, RCC pavements, manholes, pipe trenches, culverts, foundations, hard stand, feature: overlap length, royalties, taxes, handling, transportation, unloading, storage, as per drawings, manufacturers specification and direction of Engineer-in-Charge

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: GEOTECH > DESIGN & INSTALLATION OF STONE COLUMNS > STONE COLUMNS BY VIBROFLOAT METHOD
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply and filling of approved sand as per specifications in sand blankets over stone columns including cost of sand, royalties, transportation to site, spreading, watering, ramming and compaction in layers of 150 mm loose thickness to achieve 85% relative density as per IS:2720 Part XIV, including preparation of sub-grade, dressing to the required slopes with all leads and lifts, testing, etc. complete as per drawings, specifications and directions of Engineer-in Charge.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: approved sand, royalty: included, transportation: included, spreading: included, watering: included, ramming: included, compaction: included, relative density: 85%, standard: IS:2720 Part XIV (indian standard 2720 Part XIV), sub-grade preparation: included, dressing: included, leads and lifts: all, testing: included, as per drawings, specifications and directions of Engineer-in-Charge

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: GEOTECH > DESIGN & INSTALLATION OF STONE COLUMNS > STONE COLUMNS BY VIBROFLOAT METHOD
products_entries.full_product_description: Conducting footing load test on a single stone column as per specs. Initial load test at trial site on single stone column. Conducting footing load test on a single column as per specs. with appropriate sized footing, adequate reaction kentledge and hydraulic jack of suitable capacity, spreading and compacting of medium to coarse sand blanket as specified and as per direction of Engineer In Charge all complete
products_entries.core_product_name: footing load test on single stone column
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: test type: initial load test at trial site, footing: appropriate sized, reaction kentledge: adequate, hydraulic jack: suitable capacity, sand blanket: medium to coarse, spreading and compacting: included, as per direction of Engineer In Charge, as per specs.
